title: Words
blurb: It's mainly an vr-art installation about my first time in the US. I put words and situations together which I experienced during my time here.
content_html:
Inspiration

I was inspired by everything I encountered here every day. It was very intensive and different from what I was used from Europe. I was challenged by the simplest things to do like crossing the street by pushing an arrow button, taking a hot shower and finding my way...

What it does

Hopefully it shows how it feels like to be a stranger at a totally new place.

How I built it

tilt brush, unity

Challenges I ran into

to survive

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

I am sure that I have found a completely new form language for an artistic implementation of my experience in vr.

What I learned

Food is really important to work productively.

What's next for Words

Showing it to an audience in vr at different exhibitions.

I was inspired by everything I encountered here every day. It was very intensive and different from what I was used from Europe. I was challenged by the simplest things to do like crossing the street by pushing an arrow button, taking a hot shower and finding my way...


## What it does


Hopefully it shows how it feels like to be a stranger at a totally new place.


## How I built it

to survive 


## Accomplishments that I'm proud of


I am sure that I have found a completely new form language for an artistic implementation of my experience in vr.
